item.description:
Come help us ring in the new year!!

Meetup member Hope is opening up her Franklin MA home for us. Bring an appetizer to share and your drink of choice - please post what your bringing in your RSVP so we don't have 5 plates of Swedish meatballs

We can play ping pong, darts and other games.

$5.00 will be collected from each person towards noise makers, and paper goods.

If you'd rather not drive home, please contact Hope or me directly and we will try to provide accommodations - don't be shy - not a big deal - but safety IS!

2010 - will be a great year!!

Hope's address will be provided to all yes RSVP's prior to NYE.

Note: this meetup is also being posted on other meetups.
item.name: New Years Eve House Par-tay!
